actions.committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Ways and Means.

official_title: A bill to extend for an additional 3 years certain provisions relating to controversies involving whether individuals are employees for purposes of the employment taxes.
subjects: Old age, survivors and disability insurance

summary.text: Amends the Revenue Act of 1978 to extend until January 1, 1984, the period during which individuals who have not been treated as employees by their employers shall not be treated as such for purposes of the employment tax.

titles.title: A bill to extend for an additional 3 years certain provisions relating to controversies involving whether individuals are employees for purposes of the employment taxes.
